public.ping: get information about the current ping, channelcount, logcount and session handles
public.channels: get information about the currrent channels and logchannels

approved_users.stats <(user)\\self> <#(channel/all)\\ch: get modstats of a channel by a specific user in timestamp with filter

admin.log <#(channel)\\chan>: starts logging the modstats by a channel
admin.join <channel\\return>: joins a channel and listenes for messages
admin.say <message\\return>: says a message in the channel
admin.send <channel\\return> <message\\return>: sends a message to a channel
admin.addperm <user\\self>: adds permission for a user in a channel
admin.removeperm <user\\self>: removes permissions for a user in a channel
admin.checkperm <(user)\\self>: gets the permissions of a user in a channel

owner.addperm admin <user>: adds admin perms for a user
owner.removeperm admin <user>: removes admin perms from a user

whisper.oauth <channel\\channelid> <token>: sets the channel oauth token if permissions are given
whisper.oauth reset <channel\\channelid>: resets the channel oauth token to bot standart if permissions
